selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the determined time word to one of the given options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the angle value derived from the clock hands' positions to find the corresponding option label.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_clock_hands
new_skill_specs.purpose: To interpret the positions of the hour and minute hands on a clock and determine the corresponding time word.
edge_cases: When the hands are exactly on the hour or half-hour marks.
When the hands are close to each other.
